resources.string: A simple, easy and modern app to use Japanese Emoticons with Material Design ʕ•̬͡•ʕ•̫͡•♥
You have %1$d Moticoins. Do you want to spend %2$d Moticoins to unlock the %3$s Moticon?
You\'re now allowed to use this Moticon where you want. The Moticon community will be proud of you!
You don\'t have enough Moticoins to unlock this Moticon.
Get %d Moticoins to unlock Moticons and other features
There aren\'t videos at this time. Please try again later.
No results were found for your search
Hey! It looks like you\'re cheating. We\'ve reset all settings to their original values.
Use this Moticon is as simple as tapping the card, then you will be able to paste it where you want.\n\nLet\'s try with this example!
Try doing a long tap on the card. You should be able to share it to Telegram, WhatsApp, Twitter, etc.
Some Moticons need to be unlocked
There are some Moticons that need Moticoins to be unlocked.\n\nTry with this example. Don\'t worry, it\'s free!
The Moticon community wish you a warm welcome. We\'ve also added %d Moticoins to your profile as a gift.\n\nEnjoy and don\'t forget to use your Moticoins to unlock new Moticons!
Using Moticons you allow to use device identifiers to personalise content and ads. We also share such identifiers and other information from your device with Google AdSense.
You are about to close the initial guide to start using Moticons. We have a special gift at the end if you finish it. Do you want to continue with the initial guide?
Tap again to close the app
Something was wrong with the In-App Purchase. Please try again.
Thanks! This feature has been successfully unlocked
You don\'t have enough Moticons to unlock this feature
Your Google Play Store version is outdated. Please update it before doing the In-App Purchase.
